alert.note: Alert for Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Shelby and southwestern Rush Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Shelbyville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and weak rotation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Weak rotation has been detected on radar in southern Shelby County moving northeast at 40 mph. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shelbyville around 820 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 82 and 83. Interstate 74 between mile markers 112 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
